issue.title: [C++][Plasma] Add const constraint when parsing data
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8072](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8072). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Input data for plasma protocol.h/protocol.cc should be const.

comments.body:
